name: Lordmancer 2
description:
Gather a great army, crush your enemies and become the legendary Lordmancer!

Experience a FREE fully-featured 3D fantasy MMORPG. Play with your friends, fight in tactical turn-based multiplayer PvP and PvE battles, clash with other clans for territory, rankings and glory. Explore a rich open world, follow quests, search for rare resources, craft and enhance your equipment, trade with other players!

FIGHT 
● tactical turn­based multiplayer PvP and PvE battles 
● clan wars for territory and faction domination 
● castle sieges 
● rankings 

COMMUNITY 
● synchronous player PvP interactions (battles, chat, trading, cooperation) - play with your friends simultaneously 
● individual and clan dungeons 
● fair game 
● huge open game market: trade with other players 

SUPERB FANTASY WORLD 
● fantasy world 
● 3 races (Human, Orc, Elf)
● 3 classes (Warrior, Mage, Ranger) 
● 18 unique units 
● explore a vast open game world: 15 lands and more are coming 
● beautiful 3D graphics 
● enjoy quests and daily tasks
● engaging crafting and item enhancement system with resources distributed all around the world

Immerse yourself in a unique combination of MMORPG and strategy with a rich open fantasy world. Download Lordmancer II for FREE and enjoy an exciting MMORPG adventure on your mobile NOW!
